title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 48 - Material Changes In Accounting For Class A Utilities
content:

State Regulations
§ 48.1 - Material changes
§ 48.2 - Time of changes
§ 48.3 - Contents of notice
§ 48.4 - Evidence to be presented at hearings
§ 48.5 to 48.7 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 5, pt. 48

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
66[5], 80[4], 89-c[4], 97[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
